retraction_investigation.findings: No retraction notices found after comprehensive search across Cambridge Core, CrossRef, PubMed, and Retraction Watch databases

search_terms_effective: DOI-based searches on CrossRef and PubMed
query_summary.comprehensive_coverage: YES - major retraction databases and publisher checked
web_search_failures: Retraction Watch returned limited author-specific results

expression_of_concern_investigation.findings: Expression of concern published for this study in British Journal of Nutrition, Volume 127, Issue 1, p. 157, published 2022-01-14 with DOI 10.1017/S0007114521002063

expression_details.specific_concerns: Concerns raised about integrity of reported methods, results and analysis - authors unable to provide original data

expression_of_concern_investigation.classification_rationale: Formal expression of concern published by journal with official DOI, citing data integrity concerns and inability to provide original data
expression_of_concern_investigation.corrections_found: Expression of concern but not a correction or erratum

databases_queried: British Journal of Nutrition editorial archive

team_integrity_investigation.findings: Multiple expressions of concern and retractions found for senior author Zatollah Asemi - 172 papers flagged by data sleuths in 2019, 37+ papers received expressions of concern, 6+ papers retracted by 2021

authors_investigated.findings: Significant integrity concerns - 172 papers flagged by data sleuths 2019, 37+ expressions of concern, 6+ retractions by 2021
authors_investigated.concerning_patterns: Implausible randomization, participant withdrawal patterns, astonishingly prolific research activity, inability to provide original data

authors_investigated.findings: Epidemiology and biostatistics expert, established researcher

integrity_findings.retractions_found: 6+ retractions by 2021 for Zatollah Asemi in Journal of Nutrition and American Journal of Clinical Nutrition
integrity_findings.expressions_found: 37+ expressions of concern across multiple journals including Journal of American College of Nutrition
integrity_findings.misconduct_records: Data sleuths identified implausible randomization, withdrawal patterns, and inability to provide original data across 172 papers
integrity_findings.publication_patterns: Astonishingly and implausibly prolific research activity flagged as concerning

query_summary.author_matching_success: High - clear identification of all key authors

timing_analysis.retrospective_justification: Authors acknowledge administrative delays but state ethics approval obtained before study start

overall_analysis.methodology_effectiveness: Excellent - successfully identified formal expression of concern and serious team integrity issues through systematic database searches
overall_analysis.recommendations_for_improvement: Enhanced access to regional databases would improve completeness, but major integrity concerns clearly documented
